data.message: Im so fed up of this onthisday on facebook. Not possible toget rid of. Yes I have tried. Can someone create an alternative to facebook pleace?!

replies.message: Hey Rune. We hear your frustration. Have you tried following these steps to turn off your On This Day notifications? Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1Qn2Tb9. -Jordan
Well what facebook can do is to stopput these new features automatically on.
My Facebook account language is in another language and don't know how to change it to english help
Hey Richard. You can go to the bottom of any Page on Facebook and click the current language in the right corner. You can then select your language from the menu that appears. Hope this helps! -Nancy

Hi Facebook ive been really frustrated as are alot of  other group admins  the album photos when commented on no longer bump to the top of the groups page so you can see if a customer has committed on a item this is making it extremely hard on customers and group admins. Facebook always refers us to the help center to report this as a problem however its not seeming to do any good so if its something that you have recently changed can you please fill us in ?
